title: Bug 114903 - Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: Default values are not shown in the Show Report Parameters' dialog.
EB: When clicking the 'Show Report Parameters' button, I expect to see the default values displayed in the value box, so that I can easily modify the parameters I want to change.
SR: 1. Open the report. 2. Preview the report. 3. Click the 'Show Report Parameters' button. 4. Verify that the default values are displayed in the value box.
